basics.name: Richard Chiriboga
basics.label: Senior Manager, Web Development
basics.summary: Driven, collaborative Senior Web Development Manager with 20+ years of experience in directing website development across various organizational facets in global environment, including marketing, content management, corporate intranet / website restructuring, and website augmenting. Accomplished in overseeing multiple web development projects simultaneously.

work.summary: Senior Manager, Web Development for the Avon Breast Cancer Crusade and AVON 39 The Walk to End Breast Cancer. I managed all aspects of the company's web properties as well as both cross-functional and vendor relations.
highlights: Built and project managed the creation of our corporate website - AvonBcc.org (Wordpress, Bootstrap, CSS3, jQuery)
Wrote the "Check-in Friday" system (PHP, MySql, jQuery) which allows staff and volunteers to manage our walkers and crew during physical event weekends.
Built and project managed the flagship website - Avon39.org (Wordpress, Bootstrap, CSS3, jQuery) (not publicly launched for 2018)

work.summary: Manager, Web Technologies at Avon Products Inc reporting directly to the Senior Manager, Senior Manager - Global Web Architecture, Global IT. Our main responsibility was managing all web properties owned by the corporate communications department. This included the "Inside Avon" intranet as well as our corporate website - AvonCompany.com
highlights: Created company wide email signature creator. (http://richardchiriboga.com/company-email-signature/).
iPad app development for Board of Directors on-boarding and direct selling training program.
Project Managed, built and maintain AvonFoundation.org.
Built and coded the look and feel for the corporate intranet.
Became ScrumMaster for the global IT initiative in LATAM.

work.summary: Senior Web Developer Worked directly with the president and project manager in all aspects from concept to creation for client websites.
highlights: Developed and/or assisted in all major projects brought into the company.
Built and maintained a custom content management system for all clients.
Lead development paths for the business.

volunteer.summary: Work on all the web development work for the http://stopbullyingtour.org/ website.
highlights: Built Wordpress Theme for the website.
